item.title: [2024/07/28] I joined the MSJ 43rd Editorial Board of Scientific Online Letters on the Atmosphere (SOLA).
item.description: I’m honored to join the MSJ 43rd Editorial Board of SOLA, the Scientific Online Letters on the Atmosphere. http://metsoc.jp/sola/index.html

item.title: [2024/07/28] Our recent study has been published in Earth and Space Science.
item.description: Prof. Manda (Mie University) published a new study on the development of a mesoscale convective system and its environment conditions based on the intensive radiosonde observations during the field campaign in June 2022.

item.title: [2024/04/12] My new study on marine heatwaves has been published in Communications Earth & Environment.
[2024/03/12] Pages for Talks (Presentations) have been removed. See my CV for a full list of my presentations.
[2024/03/05] Our study (Wang et al. 2024) has been published in Environmental Research.
[2024/02/26] Ocean Sciences Meeting 2024
item.description: We successfully held a session for the Subtropical air-Sea interaction. Thank all speakers, attendee, and our convener team!

item.title: [2023/12/16] AGU Fall Meeting 2023
item.description: The fourth Maritime Continent and Indo-Pacific session in AGU. Thank all speakers, attendee, and our convener team!

item.title: [2023/11/22] Our recent study (Guo et al. 2023) has been published in Journal of Climate.
[2023/11/01] Our recent study (Seiki et al. 2023) has been published in SOLA.
[2023/10/16] Presentation at the Seminar for Extreme Weathers @Nanjing University
item.description: I’m pleased to give a presentation at Nanjing University and shared my works in tracing moisture sources of heavy rainfalls. During the seminar, Prof. Lei Zhao (University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign) also presented his wonderful works and shared his ideas in atmospheric boundary layer and urban microweather systems.

item.title: [2023/09/17] Our study (Wang et al. 2023) has been published in Frontiers in Ecology and Evolution.
[2023/09/11] Updated to the new Hugo version 5.
[2023/09/07] My recent study has been published in Geophysical Research Letters
[2023/08/07] APL-ICAR Workshop (Aug 7-8) @JAMSTEC
item.description: I attended the APL-ICAR (NUIST) Workshop, which held at Miyoshi Hall, JAMSTEC Yokohama Campus, Japan.

item.title: [2023/08/03] AOGS2023 in Singapore
item.description: I attended the 20th Annual Meeting of the Asia Oceania Geosciences Society held in Singapore

item.title: [2023/03/21] Our study has been published in Remote Sensing
